name: Solitaire 95: The Classic Game
description:
The Original Solitaire, just like you remember! Solitaire 95 by Tripledot studios gives you the original classical solitaire experience (also known as Klondike Solitaire / Patience). Amazing Daily Challenges, great animations, and multiple game modes are all designed to give you the best possible retro Solitaire experience, just like you remember it. If you liked Windows 95 Solitaire, you will love Solitaire 95.

Simply the best Solitaire game! Solitaire, also known as Patience or Klondike Solitaire is the most popular card game in the world. Beautiful and fun like the classic Windows Solitaire, our app is the BEST FREE SOLITAIRE card game in the market.

Features:
- Amazing daily challenges
- Beautiful graphics
- Klondike gameplay
- Unlimited free undo
- Unlimited free hints
- Customize your cards & the table design
- Vegas scoring
- Vegas cumulative
- Option for All Winning deals

- Draw 1 or 3 cards
- Auto complete for solved game
- Statistics
- Personal records
- Left handed mode
- Tablet support


Each day you’ll receive a unique Daily Challenge. Solve the Daily Challenge and receive a crown for that day. Earn trophies each month by winning more crowns! Your Daily Challenges, crowns, and current trophy status are available to view any time.

Play Solitaire now on iOS for FREE!
